- copied from [timelyportfolio/stockchartR](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/timelyportfolio/stockchartR/master/README.md)

```{r download, echo=FALSE, eval=FALSE}
library(quantmod)

spy <- getSymbols("SPY", auto.assign = F)
save(spy, file = "../data/spy.rda")

aapl <- getSymbols("AAPL", auto.assign = FALSE)
save(aapl, file = "../data/aapl.rda")

devtools::document()
devtools::install()
```

```{r stockchartR-aapl, message=FALSE}
library(stockchartR)
library(quantmod)

data(spy, package = "rcw")
stockchart(tail(spy,200))

# look at the static plot for reference
data(aapl, package = "rcw")
chartSeries(adjustOHLC(aapl),theme="white")
# now make an interactive plot
stockchart(adjustOHLC(aapl))
```
